Author: AndyKelley
Content:
What I mean by that is just a device that is made solely for texting and thus does a good job at making it easy.

By the way I'm a Dvorak user :)

Author: Dylanfm
Content: Surely some of the creative pursuits will lead back to engineering, although maybe not in a traditional sense - and (possibly) not via university.

Author: eru
Content:
I do not think users will really want a keyboard. Otherwise they would have already bought them.

They have to be big to be comfortable - but then they are too big for the pocket, I guess. (And Qwerty is not exactly the best layout - but nobody seems to care.)

Author: eru
Content: Yes.  Perhaps we could give money to a someone (e.g. a charitiy) who does this for us.  It's a lofty goal.

Author: eru
Content: Perhaps you can ask them to keep those continuations open longer for logged-in users.  Or they already do this.
